alfredsnippet.snippet:
def color_negative_red(val):
    '''  Usage: df.style.applymap(color_negative_red) '''
    color = 'red' if val < 0 else 'black'
    return 'color: %s' % color

# aliter:   df.style.applymap(lambda s: 'color: %s' % ('red' if s > 1 else 'black'))
# aliter:   df.style.applymap(lambda s: 'color: {}'.format('red' if s > 1 else 'black'))
alfredsnippet.name: pandas stylying 1
